item.title: Noora Ray Tracer
item.description:
Noora is a Ray Tracer that I have implemented as my personal prjoects, which comes from own passion for computer graphics and real-time rendering (though it is an off-line Ray Tracer now, but currently I am working on its real-time version). It is actually a Monte Carlo Path Tracer that I have implemented it based on Peter Shirley’s Ray Tracing series and his algorithms.

Future Works

I have plan to add other ray tracing algorithms to this ray tracer and more advanced numerical algorithms to it. I also plan to change its backend to support CUDA, OpenGL and Vulkan.
